title: After pressing launch there´s a popup that says a file is missing PLZ HELP
body: I start up my league. I´m making my way to the login section and all of a sudden when i press launch. there´s a message on screen that states as the following: This program cannot start correctly (0xc0000004) click ok to shut down the program. and it´s really annoying cuz i love this game and everything about it (exept for when u get camped) so im sad that i cant play it because of this error. RIOT PLEASE FIX THIS.{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
I`VE BEEN TRYING FOR AROUND 4 1/2 HOURS AND IT WORKS NOW
I REINSTALLED IT LIKE 6 TIMES
AND IT WORKS IMM SOOOOOOOOO HAPPY <3<3<3<3<3
